atlas_info : ATLAS
image_file : "data/goblin.png"

rows : 8
columns : 8

tile_width : 256
tile_height : 256

// This is an ambiguous language.
// Man scheme as a DSL would be very useful
// although I'm trying to get some educational value.
// TODO(jerry) : Change syntax from {} to refer to "blocks"
// [] is used for lists and can be scanned frequently.
atlas_rects : [ [0, 0, 256, 256], [256, 0, 256, 256] ]
